articles.author: Robert Brand, Julien Ponthus
articles.title: Asian Stocks to Rise on US Gains, China to Re-Open: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: European stocks fell and US equity futures drifted as traders look to the upcoming earnings season for validation of the artificial intelligence frenzy that has powered a record rally.
